weekly_top_story.headline: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu requests pardon amid ongoing corruption trial
weekly_top_story.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu submitted a pardon request to the Office of the President's legal department during his ongoing corruption trial, raising significant legal and political implications for Israel.

stories.headline: US President Donald Trump confirms recent call with Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro amid tensions
stories.summary: Amid rising tensions between the US and Venezuela, President Donald Trump confirmed a recent phone call with Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro, while Caracas criticized US military preparations.

stories.headline: India achieves major climate goals at UN COP30 summit, leading BASIC group and developing countries
stories.summary: At the UN COP30 climate summit in Brazil, India achieved significant climate targets, strengthening its leadership role among developing nations and influencing global climate policy.

stories.headline: Earthquake of magnitude 4.4 shakes Bajhang district in Nepal with no reported damage
stories.summary: A moderate earthquake hit Nepal's Bajhang district causing tremors in western provinces but no casualties or damage have been reported.
